original_text: And whenever the harmful spirit from God was upon Saul, David took the lyre and played it with his hand. So Saul was refreshed and was well, and the harmful spirit departed from him.
korean_text: 하나님께서 부리시는 악령이 사울에게 이를 때에 다윗이 수금을 들고 와서 손으로 탄즉 사울이 상쾌하여 낫고 악령이 그에게서 떠나더라

sentences.original_text: And whenever the harmful spirit from God was upon Saul
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께로서 온 해로운 영이 사울에게 임할 때마다

sentences.original_text: and played it with his hand.
and the harmful spirit departed from him.
